descriptionHtml:
---------V2 Update--------
updated the bow tie to fit correctly on male caracters aswell... doh...

------------------


So apparently there was plenty of wannabe timelords and backalley magicians (and probably a bare necked pinup girl or two) out there, so i did it, i made a bow tie and this is the bow tie, and what a bow tie it is, it might very well be the finest bowtie in all of the land that i have bestowed my gaze upon on this mighty finest of days.

as i said it\'s a bow tie.

it comes in four different colors, and can be crafted on the tanningrack and works as an amulet...
there i think that was is...

wait no, if you are interested in the fez, look at my other mod in here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36300/?

else if your in a gorier mood, check out my new vegas mod here:
http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/48653/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D48653%26user%3D1&pUp=1
author: Quacko
